content: this pattern was written with korean but it included all chart so you can do easy pattern download 1 click link below you will see my blog look for 첨부파일 1 on the upper right and click it click 마시멜로_스카프 and you will open or save pdf file - if you want more large or small adjust your crochet size or yarn - if you want more length add row between row 50 and row 115 1 http //www ravelry com/dls/okmin-park-designs/83822 filename=tinysca pdf
